channel.title: Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Assignments
item.description: Weekly Writing Assignments Each week starting the second week of class, students must answer each of the study questions in a paragraph or so in the body of an email. These assignments are due each week at 11:59 pm the night before class. Requirements for Students Taking the Course for More than 6 Units Course version 6.9041 For students in the 6.9041 version (12 units, Independent Inquiry), an additional 6 hours per week working on a project related to ethics and electical engineering / computer science is required.
